section.title: Warning
section.para: This documentation is not finished! Part or all of it's content may be missing or inaccurate. As Umit is under constant development and improvement, expect changes in this documentation at upcoming releases.

section.title: Introduction
section.para: The idea of the NSE facilitator is to provide a better integration of Umit, Nmap and NSE in such a way that even a newbie could easilly run and share scripts with a few clicks, instead of finding them in the web, downloading, reading documentation to know how to use it with Nmap and running a long command to be able to use it.
